sentences.english: Lipid rafts are liquid-ordered membrane microdomains with a unique protein and lipid composition found on the plasma membrane of most mammalian cells.

sentences.english: Exocytosis The bulk transport of materials out of the cell across the plasma membrane.

sentences.english: The un-ionized form is usually lipid soluble and diffuses readily across cell membranes.

sentences.english: As a free radical, oxygen in the body can corrode cell membranes, which will damage DNA and the fats.

sentences.english: Archaeans have cell membranes that are completely different from both bacteria and eukaryotes.

sentences.english: The cells of an animal have a bag-like outer covering, called a membrane.
sentences.chinese: 動物細胞有一個口袋狀的外層，叫細胞膜。

sentences.english: The prey became the mitochondrion, the cellular organ that produces energy.

sentences.english: Finally, the prospects of the research and application of membrane mimetic surfaces are suggested.
